CustomField.formula: If (ISblank(SLATargetDate__c),false, /*if the SLATargetdate is blank donâ€™t set charter */ (If(Isblank(ClosedDate), /* check to see if closed date is set */ IF(SLATargetDate__c > now(),false,true), /*compare SLA date to now flag on if we have passed the SLA target date*/ If(ClosedDate>SLATargetDate__c,true,false)))) /* or closed date is set compare to SLAtargetdate,set flag on if closed date>the /*SLA*/
CustomField.label: Out of Charter
